name: Pop'Em Palooza!
description:
BEST IF PLAYED IN FULL-SCREEN MODE!

A chain reaction is a series of events, each caused by the previous one. The gameplay elements here in POP’EM PALOOZA celebrate this theme by allowing players to launch an object into an area that will create a pinball-effect of unexpected occurrences. The player has control over the direction and velocity which they launch the object, however, after its launched the object will bounce and meet multiple surfaces, popping balloons in its path.
